ShortDescription.Value: This Pack unlocks the Evacuation Bus, as well as length variations for tram

Publish.LongDescription:
## Tram Variation Asset Pack This Pack unlocks the Evacuation Bus, as well as length variations for trams.
## New Assets - Evacuation Bus (cap. 140) can be used on bus lines - Tram (2 Segments (cap. 160) - Tram (3 Segments, Vanilla) (cap. 240) - Tram (4 Segments) (cap. 320) - Tram (5 Segments) (cap. 400) - Tram (6 Segments) (cap. 480) - Tram (2x3 Segments) (cap. 480)
Publish.ChangeLog: - Add capacities to ingame display name
